  5 
  6     var app = angular.module('AngularChatApp', [
  7         'ui.router',
  8         'restangular',
  9         'app.controllers',
 10         'ngCookies',
 11         'ngWebSocket' 
 12     ]).config(function($interpolateProvider,$httpProvider) {
 13     $interpolateProvider.startSymbol('[[');
 14     $interpolateProvider.endSymbol(']]');
 15     $httpProvider.defaults.xsrfCookieName = 'csrftoken';
 16     $httpProvider.defaults.xsrfHeaderName = 'X-CSRFToken';
 17 })
 18 
 19 .run(function ($rootScope, Auth, ChatConfig) {
